about_the_game:
Get ready for an exhilarating adventure in the world of pirates with our new 3D fighting game "Scallywag's Revenge"!
You are a bold pirate embarking on a dangerous journey filled with intrigue and brutal battles.
Each level is a unique challenge where you must fight against other ruthless pirates to achieve your revenge!

Engage with a diverse array of enemies, each possessing their own unique abilities.
Become a true master of parrying and counterattacks to gain the upper hand in every duel!
Use your agility and skill to overcome all obstacles in your path.

Game features:

Unique enemies
Mastery of parrying
Adrenaline-fueled adventure
3D graphics
